00002 #define JSLOG_CC

00004 #define JS_LOG(msg)                                                                                                             \
00005     const size_t line_number = __LINE__;                                                                \
00006     size_t len = floor(line_number) + 1;                                                                \
00007     len = std::string(msg).size() + strlen(__FILE__) + len + 5;                 \
00008     char buffer[len];                                                                                                   \
00009     memset(buffer, 0, len);                                                                                             \
00010     snprintf(buffer, len, "%s:%i - ", __FILE__, line_number);                   \
00011     strncat(buffer, std::string(msg).c_str(), len - strlen(buffer));    \
00012     Log(npp_, buffer);
00013

00015         // Log given message to javascript console.
00016         bool Log(NPP npp, const char* msg, ...) {
00017                 bool rv = false;
00018                 NPObject* window = NULL;
00019                 if (NPERR_NO_ERROR == NPN_GetValue(npp, NPNVWindowNPObject, &window)) {
00020                         const char buffer[] = "top.console";
00021                         NPString console_stript = { 0 };
00022                         console_stript.UTF8Length = strlen(buffer);
00023                         console_stript.UTF8Characters = buffer;
00024                         NPVariant console;
00025                         if (NPN_Evaluate(npp, window, &console_stript, &console)) {
00026                                 if (NPVARIANT_IS_OBJECT(console)) {
00027                                         // Convert the message to NPString;
00028                                         NPVariant text;
00029                                         STRINGN_TO_NPVARIANT(msg, static_cast<uint32_t>(strlen(msg)),
00030                                                                                  text);
00031                                         NPVariant result;
00032                                         if (NPN_Invoke(npp, NPVARIANT_TO_OBJECT(console),
00033                                                                    NPN_GetStringIdentifier("log"), &text, 1, &result)) {
00034                                                 NPN_ReleaseVariantValue(&result);
00035                                                 rv = true;
00036                                         }
00037                                 }
00038                                 NPN_ReleaseVariantValue(&console);
00039                         }
00040                 }
00041                 return rv;
00042         }
00043 
00044 #endif
